Package money.zumo.zumokit

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AccountCallback
    Callback interface used by methods in User class.
    AccountFiatPropertiesCallback
    Callback interface used by methods in User class.
    AccountListener
    Callback interface used by methods in User class.
    ComposeExchangeCallback
    Callback interface used by methods in Wallet class.
    ComposeTransactionCallback
    Callback interface used by methods in Wallet class.
    HistoricalExchangeRatesCallback
    Callback interface used by methods in ZumoKit class
    MnemonicCallback
    Callback interface used by methods in User class.
    StateListener
    Callback interface used by methods in ZumoKit class
    SubmitExchangeCallback
    Callback interface used by methods in Wallet class.
    SubmitTransactionCallback
    Callback interface used by methods in Wallet class.
    SuccessCallback
    Callback interface used by methods in User class.
    TransactionListener
    Callback interface used by methods in User class.
    User
    User class provides methods for managing user wallet and accounts.
    UserCallback
    Callback interface used by methods in ZumoKit class
    UserListener
    Callback interface used by methods in User class.
    Utils
    Utility class providing blockchain related utility methods.
    Wallet
    User wallet provides methods for transfer and exchange of fiat and cryptocurrency funds.
    WalletCallback
    Callback interface used by methods in User class.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Account
    Record containing account details.
    AccountCryptoProperties
    Account's crypto related properties.
    AccountFiatProperties
    Account's fiat related properties.
    AccountListener.CppProxy  
    AccountType
    Account type, 'STANDARD', 'COMPATIBILITY' or 'SEGWIT'.
    ComposedExchange
    Result of the compose exchange method on Wallet object.
    ComposedTransaction
    Result of one of the transaction compose methods on Wallet object.
    CurrencyCode
    Currency code, such as 'GBP', 'BTC' or 'ETH'.
    CurrencyType
    Curency type, 'FIAT' or 'CRYPTO'.
    Exchange
    Record containing exchange details.
    ExchangeRate
    Zumo exchange rates used in making exchanges.
    ExchangeSettings
    Zumo exchange settings used in making exchanges.
    ExchangeStatus
    Exchange status, such as 'PENDING', 'DEPOSITED' and 'CONFIRMED'.
    FeeRates
    Crypto transactions fee rates.
    HistoricalExchangeRatesInterval
    Historical exchange rate intervals, such as 'hour', 'week' or 'year'
    NetworkType
    Network type, such as 'MAINNET', 'TESTNET' or 'RINKEBY'.
    State
    ZumuKit state.
    StateListener.CppProxy  
    Transaction
    Record containing transaction details.
    TransactionCryptoProperties
    Record containing transaction's crypto properties.
    TransactionDirection
    Transaction direction, 'INCOMING' or 'OUTGOING'.
    TransactionFiatProperties
    Record containing transaction's fiat properties.
    TransactionListener.CppProxy  
    TransactionStatus
    Transaction status, such as 'PENDING' and 'CONFIRMED'.
    TransactionType
    Tracation type, 'CRYPTO', 'EXCHANGE', 'FIAT' or 'NOMINATED'.
    User.CppProxy  
    UserListener.CppProxy  
    Utils.CppProxy  
    Wallet.CppProxy  
    ZumoKit
    Entry point to ZumoKit Android SDK.
    ZumoKitErrorCode
    The code of error returned.
    ZumoKitErrorType
    The type of error returned.
